heisigStory: The taskmaster sets an unruly servant free, giving him no more than a quick glance at the compass and a boot from behind.
koohiiStory1: Go in any direction away from your taskmaster when you are set free.
koohiiStory2: When slaves were set free from their masters, they set off in all directions… RTK2:　ホウ　放射　ほうしゃ(radiation)… Pure group: 倣979.
kunYomi: はな.す、-っぱな.し、はな.つ、はな.れる、こ.く、ほう.る
myStory: thả. giải phóng. đánh vào hướng đi để thả tự do
readingExamples: 放す (はな.す), 放つ (はな.つ), 放れる (はな.れる)
words: leave as is, leave to chance, leave alone, neglect
to throw out, to fire, to expel, to give up, to abandon, to neglect
leave, get free, cut oneself off
let go, abandon, leave undone, throw, toss, fling
